description:
Enpi-chan was pulling the strings behind the spirits, but it turns out that the angel, Markangel was pulling the strings behind Enpi-chan - and the ones who ordered him to do so were the gods of the heavens themselves!
It is time for a conference between the heavens and the underworld to begin, and so the angel know as Benten has come down from the heavens, while King Enma is taking the stage for the underworld - what will the outcome of the fated meeting be?
Source: Official Site

titles.title: Atashi ni wa Kakawari no Nai Koto de Gozansu
あたしにはかかわりのないことでござんす
